item.title: Assessment Plan Model JSON Format Reference
item.description: Schema download oscal_assessment-plan_schema.json Schema version 1.0.0-milestone3 Short name oscal-ap The OSCAL assessment plan format is used to describe the information typically provided by an assessor during the preparation for an assessment. The root of the OSCAL assessment plan format is assessment-plan. Switch to XML activity-uuid Name Activity ID Description Links the task to a defined activity. A string property (type uuid). This object appears as a property on: task.
